compliant.section: To the extent provided for by local law and subject to applicable exceptions, individuals may have the following privacy rights in relation to their Personal Information: The right to know information about our processing of your Personal Information, including the specific pieces of Personal Information that we have collected from you
compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed, Right of access

compliant.section: The right to request deletion of your Personal Information
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

compliant.section: The right to correct your Personal Information
The right to be free from discrimination relating to the exercise of any of your privacy rights
We don’t “sell” Personal Information or “share” Personal Information for cross-contextual behavioral advertising (as those terms are defined under applicable local law)
We also don’t process sensitive Personal Information for the purposes of inferring characteristics about a consumer
compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data

compliant.section: Exercising your rights. To the extent applicable under local law, you can exercise privacy rights described in this section by submitting a request through privacy.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject

non_compliant.section: We may disclose this information to our affiliates, vendors and service providers to process in accordance with our instructions; to law enforcement and other third parties for the legal reasons described above; to parties involved in Transactions; and to corporate administrators of enterprise or team accounts.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Responsibility of the controller, Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law, Processor
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the legal basis for disclosing data to each category of recipient (e.g., affiliates, vendors, law enforcement). It should also specify appropriate safeguards for international transfers if applicable.

non_compliant.section: We may disclose this information to our affiliates, vendors and service providers to process in accordance with our instructions; to law enforcement and other third parties for the legal reasons described above; to parties involved in Transactions; and to other users and third parties you choose to share it with.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Responsibility of the controller, Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law, Processor
non_compliant.amend: Similar to the previous point, the policy needs to be more specific about the legal basis for each disclosure and the safeguards in place.

non_compliant.section: We may disclose this information to our affiliates, vendors and service providers to process in accordance with our instructions; to law enforcement and other third parties for the legal reasons described above; and to parties involved in Transactions.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Responsibility of the controller, Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law, Processor
non_compliant.amend: The policy should provide more details about the legal basis for disclosure and safeguards, especially for international data transfers.

non_compliant.section: Your account login credentials and payment card information (Sensitive Personal Information) We disclose this information to our affiliates, vendors and service providers, law enforcement, and parties involved in Transactions.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Responsibility of the controller, Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law, Processor, Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: Disclosing sensitive data like login credentials requires a strong legal basis and robust security measures. The policy should explicitly state these.

non_compliant.section: If you do not have an account with us, or if we suspect fraudulent or malicious activity, we may ask you to provide additional Personal Information and proof of residency for verification.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (data minimisation)
non_compliant.amend: Requesting proof of residency might be excessive for verification purposes. The policy should ensure data collected is necessary and proportionate to the purpose.

non_compliant.section: If we cannot verify your identity, we will not be able to honor your request.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: While verification is important, the policy should also explain alternative ways to exercise rights if identity cannot be verified.
